424.description: The GitHub API rate limit was hit. See response header Retry-After.

429.description: A GitHub API error occurred. See error message for details.

post.summary: Attempt to perform a server upgrade.

requestBody.description: The model containing the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Administration.NewVersion to update to.

410.description: The requested version could not be found.

422.description: Upgrade operations are unavailable due to the launch configuration of TGS.

424.description: A GitHub rate limit was encountered.

422.description: Restart operations are unavailable due to the launch configuration of TGS.

post.summary: Changes the active BYOND version to the one specified in a given model.

202.description: Created Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Job to install and switch active version successfully.

put.summary: Create a new chat bot model.

200.description: Update applied successfully. Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.ChatBot may or may not be returned based on user permissions.

204.description: Chat bot deleted or does not exist.

501.description: POSIX system impersonation requested but not implemented.
POSIX system impersonation requested but not implemented.

get.summary: Get the contents of the root configuration directory.

501.description: POSIX system impersonation requested but not implemented.

202.description: Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Job to launch the watchdog started successfully.

delete.summary: Stops the Watchdog if it's running.

post.summary: Update watchdog settings to be applied at next server reboot.

patch.summary: Creates a Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Job to restart the Watchdog. It will start if it wasn't already running.

200.description: Changes applied successfully. The updated Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.DreamMaker settings will be returned.

204.description: Changes applied successfully. The updated Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.DreamMaker settings will be not be returned due to permissions.

get.summary: Get a Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.CompileJob specified by a given id.

404.description: Specified compile job does not exist in this instance.

post.summary: Attempt to authenticate a Tgstation.Server.Host.Models.User using Tgstation.Server.Host.Controllers.ApiController.ApiHeaders

200.description: User logged in and Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Token generated successfully.

403.description: User authenticated but is disabled by an administrator.

202.description: Instance updated successfully and relocation job created.

delete.summary: Detach an Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Instance with the given id.

post.summary: Update the permissions for an Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.InstanceUser.

204.description: Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.InstanceUser deleted or no longer exists.

get.summary: Get active Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Jobs for the instance.
List all Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.JobTgstation.Server.Api.Models.EntityIds for the instance in reverse creation order.

parameters.description: The Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.EntityId.Id of the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Job to cancel.

404.description: Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Job does not exist in this instance.

parameters.description: The Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.EntityId.Id of the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Job to retrieve.

schema.description: The Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.EntityId.Id of the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Job to retrieve.

404.description: Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Job does not exist in this instance.

put.summary: Begin cloning the repository if it doesn't exist.

201.description: The Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Repository was created successfully and the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Job to clone it has begun.

202.description: Job to delete the repository created successfully.

201.description: Retrieved the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Repository settings successfully, though they did not previously exist.

202.description: Updated the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Repository settings successfully and a Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Job was created to make the requested git changes.

410.description: The Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Internal.User.SystemIdentifier requested could not be loaded.

501.description: A system user was requested but this is not implemented on POSIX.

get.summary: Get information about the current Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.User.
List all Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Users in the server.

windowsHost.description: If the server is running on a windows operating system

trackedRepositoryUrl.description: The GitHub repository the server is built to recieve updates from

latestVersion.description: The latest available version of the Tgstation.Server.Host assembly from the upstream repository. If System.Version.Major is higher than Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Administration.NewVersion's the update cannot be applied due to API changes

newVersion.description: Changes the version of Tgstation.Server.Host to the given version from the upstream repository

ErrorCode.description: Types of Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.ErrorMessages that the API may return.

serverApiVersion.description: The version of the API the server is using

message.description: A human readable description of the error

additionalData.description: Additional data associated with the error message.

ErrorMessage.description: Represents an error message returned by the server

enabled.description: If the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Internal.User is enabled since users cannot be deleted. System users cannot be disabled

systemIdentifier.description: The SID/UID of the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Internal.User on Windows/POSIX respectively

RightsType.description: The type of rights a model uses

exceptionDetails.description: Details of any exceptions caught during the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Internal.Job

cancelRight.description: The N:Tgstation.Server.Api.Rights required to cancel the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Internal.Job

Job.description: Represents a long running job on the server. Model is read-only, updates attempt to cancel the job

version.description: The System.Version of the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Byond installation used for new compiles. Will be <see langword="null" /> if the user does not have permission to view it or there is no BYOND version installed. Only considers the System.Version.Major and System.Version.Minor numbers.

ircChannel.description:
The IRC channel name. Also potentially contains the channel passsword (if separated by a colon).
If multiple copies of the same channel with different keys are added to the server, the one that will be used is undefined.

isAdminChannel.description: If the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.ChatChannel is an admin channel

isWatchdogChannel.description: If the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.ChatChannel is a watchdog channel

isUpdatesChannel.description: If the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.ChatChannel is an updates channel

tag.description: A custom tag users can define to group channels together

channels.description: Channels the Discord bot should listen/announce in

reconnectionInterval.description: The time interval in minutes the chat bot attempts to reconnect if Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Internal.ChatBot.Enabled and disconnected. Must not be zero.

channelLimit.description: The maximum number of Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.ChatChannels the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Internal.ChatBot may contain.

connectionString.description: The information used to connect to the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Internal.ChatBot.Provider

accessDenied.description: If access to the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.ConfigurationFile file was denied for the operation

lastReadHash.description: The MD5 hash of the file when last read by the user. If this doesn't match during update actions, the write will be denied with System.Net.HttpStatusCode.Conflict

content.description: The content of the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.ConfigurationFile. Will be <see langword="null" /> if Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.ConfigurationFile.AccessDenied is <see langword="true" /> or during listing and write operations

ConfigurationFile.description: Represents a game configuration file. Create and delete actions uncerimonuously overwrite/delete files

titleAtMerge.description: The title of the pull request

bodyAtMerge.description: The body of the pull request

url.description: The URL of the pull request

author.description: The author of the pull request

number.description: The number of the pull request

pullRequestRevision.description: The sha of the pull request revision to merge. If not specified, the latest commit shall be used (semi-unsafe)

originCommitSha.description: The sha of the most recent remote commit

byondVersion.description: The Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Byond.Version the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.CompileJob was made with

directoryName.description: The Game folder the results were compiled into

currentPort.description: The port the running Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.DreamDaemon instance is set to

currentAllowWebclient.description: The webclient status the running Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.DreamDaemon instance is set to

autoStart.description: If Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.DreamDaemon starts when it's Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Instance starts

softRestart.description: If the server is undergoing a soft reset. This may be automatically set by changes to other fields

softShutdown.description: If the server is undergoing a soft shutdown

allowWebClient.description: If the BYOND web client can be used to connect to the game server

primaryPort.description: The first port Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.DreamDaemon uses. This should be the publically advertised port

startupTimeout.description: The DreamDaemon startup timeout in seconds

DreamDaemon.description: Represents an instance of BYOND's DreamDaemon game server. Create action starts the server. Delete action shuts down the server

projectName.description: The .dme file Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.DreamMaker tries to compile with without the extension

apiValidationPort.description: The port used during compilation to validate the DMAPI

DreamMaker.description: Represents the state of the DreamMaker compiler. Create action starts a new compile. Delete action cancels the current compile

EntityId.description: Common base of Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.CompileJobs and Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Jobs.

apiVersion.description: The N:Tgstation.Server.Api version of the host

minimumPasswordLength.description: Minimum length of database user passwords.

instanceLimit.description: The maximum number of Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Instances allowed.

userLimit.description: The maximum number of Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Users allowed.

validInstancePaths.description: Limits the locations instances may be created or attached from.

Token.description: Represents a JWT returned by the API

ConfigurationType.description: The type of configuration allowed on an Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Instance

id.description: The id of the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Instance. Not modifiable

path.description: The path to where the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Instance is located. Can only be changed while the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Instance is offline. Must not exist when the instance is created

autoUpdateInterval.description: The time interval in minutes the repository is automatically pulled and compiles. 0 disables

chatBotLimit.description: The maximum number of Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.ChatBots the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Instance may contain.

userId.description: The Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Internal.User.Id of the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.User the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.InstanceUser belongs to

InstanceUser.description: Represents a Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Users permissions in an Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Instance

number.description: The number of the pull request

pullRequestRevision.description: The sha of the pull request revision to merge. If not specified, the latest commit shall be used (semi-unsafe)

origin.description: The origin URL. If <see langword="null" />, the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Repository does not exist

checkoutSha.description: The commit HEAD should point to. Not populated in responses, use Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Repository.RevisionInformation instead for retrieval

gitHubOwner.description: If the repository was cloned from GitHub.com this will be set with the owner of the repository

gitHubName.description: If the repository was cloned from GitHub.com this will be set with the name of the repository

updateFromOrigin.description: Do the equivalent of a git pull. Will attempt to merge unless Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Repository.Reference is also specified in which case a hard reset will be performed after checking out

reference.description: The branch or tag HEAD points to

newTestMerges.description: Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.TestMergeParameters for new Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.TestMerges. Note that merges that conflict will not be performed

accessUser.description: The username to access the git repository with

accessToken.description: The token/password to access the git repository with

pushTestMergeCommits.description: If commits created from testmerges are pushed to the remote

showTestMergeCommitters.description: If test merge commits are signed with the username of the person who merged it. Note this only affects future commits

autoUpdatesKeepTestMerges.description: If test merge commits should be kept when auto updating. May cause merge conflicts which will block the update

autoUpdatesSynchronize.description: If synchronization should occur when auto updating

postTestMergeComment.description: If test merging should create a comment

enabled.description: If the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Internal.User is enabled since users cannot be deleted. System users cannot be disabled

systemIdentifier.description: The SID/UID of the Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.Internal.User on Windows/POSIX respectively

UserUpdate.description: For editing a given Tgstation.Server.Api.Models.User. Will never be returned by the API

400.description: A badly formatted request was made. See error message for details.

403.description: User lacks sufficient permissions for the operation.

409.description: A data integrity check failed while performing the operation. See error message for details.

500.description: The server encountered an unhandled error. See error message for details.

503.description: The server may be starting up or shutting down.

501.description: This operation requires POSIX system identites to be implemented. See https://github.com/tgstation/tgstation-server/issues/709

api.name: api
api.description: The API version being used in the form "Tgstation.Server.Api/[API version]"

User-Agent.name: User-Agent
User-Agent.description: The user agent of the calling client.
